auth.splashMessage: Stay in touch with the city
auth.enterNumberDescriptionText: You'll receive an SMS code to verify your phone number

locationPermission.permissionScreenDescription: Citya finds the best routes based on your location
locationPermission.noPermissionAlertTitle: The app requires access to your location to work properly
locationPermission.noPermissionAlertDescription: Citya needs access to your location so we always know where to pick you up.

auth.errorInvalidSmsCode:
Enter a valid verification code. 
Problems with the code? Request it again.
auth.errorCodeSendBlocked: Oops! We cannot send the code right now. Please try again later.
auth.errorService: Oops! An error occurred. Please try again later.
auth.errorCantRegisterDriver: This phone number is not associated with any driver account. Try again or sign up.
auth.errorUnknown: Oops! Something went wrong. Try again later.

profile.deleteAccountDisclaimer: Do you really want to delete your account? Information about your profile will be removed. To use Citya after it you would need to register again.
profile.accountDeletedDescription1: Your request to delete the account has been processed. All profile information has been removed.
profile.accountDeletedDescription2: If you wish to use the service again, please register though the application one more time.

personalInfo.fieldRequiredError: Please fill in all the fields
personalInfo.emailAlreadyTakenError: An account with this email already exists

booking.cancelRideConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel your ride?
booking.cancelDrivingUpRideConfirmationMessage: The car is already on the way. Do you really want to cancel your ride?

rideProposal.title: Your ride summary
rideProposal.walkToPickup: Walk {} min to your pick-up point

booking.warningDestinationOutOfArea: Citya doesn't cover the address you chose. Please select an address inside the coverage area.
booking.warningPickupOutOfArea: Citya is not available in this location yet. We will offer you a pick-up point within the coverage area.
booking.errorRideRequestFailed: Oops! Your ride request has failed. Please try again later.

ride request

finished.rideCompletedTitle: Ride complete - we hope you had a great one!

ride.youMissedPickup: Unfortunately, you've missed the pick-up time and we couldn't reach you, so we had to cancel your ride.

carSelection.welcomeCallToAction: Which car will you drive today?

driverAvailability.youAreAvailableMessage: You're currently available to receive rides.
driverAvailability.youAreUnavailableMessage:
You're not available  for new rides.

driverAvailability.youAreOfflineMessage: You're currently unavailable to receive rides
driverAvailability.driverOutOfArea: You are currently outside of the coverage area. Please go to one of our coverage areas and try again.

rideCard.cancelRideModalMessage: The passenger didn't show up. Do you want to cancel the ride?

onboarding.title1: Daily mobility to keep you in touch with the city
onboarding.title2: Convenient ride always at your fingertips
onboarding.title3:
Meet you at Citya 
virtual stops!
onboarding.description1: On-demand transport for convenient commuting for less than your morning cup of coffee.
onboarding.description2: Ride from Monday to Saturday, 7:00 to 19:00. We're ready to go right when you need to.
onboarding.description3: Instead of fixed public transport stops, Citya stops are virtually everywhere. Easily recognisable, safe and always nearby.
onboarding.description4: Our pooled electric minivan always arrives nearby and on time. Just hop on and enjoy your journey!
onboarding.description5: Get off just a few steps from where you need to go (or your transfer point), saving quite some CO2!
onboarding.description6: For 100% hassle-free commuting, book your rides in advance or schedule recurring rides.
onboarding.description7: Book your first ride with Citya and experience true convenience!

payment.youMustAddMethod: To request a ride you must add a payment method.
payment.smallAmountConfirm:
Citya may charge a small amount to confirm your card details. 
This is immediately refunded.
